name: Samosa
description: A crispy and spicy Indian snack filled with potatoes and peas.

name: Define Big Data and Explain 3V of Big Data.
description: Big Data is a term used to describe data that has massive volume, comes in a variety of structure and is generated at high velocity.This kind of data possesses challenges to the traditional RDBMS used for storing and processing data.Big Data is paring way for new approaches of processing and storing data.
